snippet: Louise Despont mines the ancient and the abstract in “Tide Fulcrum & The Motion of Fixed Stars” at Nicelle Beauchene Gallery.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews drawings by Louise Despont at Nicelle Beauchene gallery.
lead_paragraph: Louise Despont mines the ancient and the abstract in “Tide Fulcrum & The Motion of Fixed Stars” at Nicelle Beauchene Gallery.
